traits.description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. he can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
traits.name: nudist

traits.description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. he is four times as likely to start a social fight as others. Furthermore unlike others he is able to gain bloodlust focus inspirations.
traits.name: bloodlust

traits.description: Timmy is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person. he rarely insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around him. he also never judges people by their appearance. his agreeableness also makes him more likely to conform to prevailing opinions.
traits.name: kind

traits.description: Timmy has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother him at all. he doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects him. he also feels no mood boost from socializing.
traits.name: psychopath

traits.description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, he tried it... and he liked it.
traits.name: cannibal

traits.description: Timmy always says exactly what's on his mind, especially if it's bugging him. That tends to rub people the wrong way.
traits.name: abrasive

traits.description: Timmy is too smart for his own good. he learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
traits.name: toosmart

traits.description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. his accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but he'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: brawler

traits.description: For Timmy, there's something exciting about getting hurt. he doesn't know why, he's just wired differently.
traits.name: masochist

traits.description:
Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

he gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

he doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
traits.name: nightowl

traits.description: Timmy needs a really impressive bedroom. he gets a mood loss if he doesn't get what he wants.
traits.name: greedy

traits.description: For Timmy, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. he gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.
traits.name: jealous

traits.description: Timmy has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. he will become unhappy if he has a bedroom that's too impressive. he also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. he never judges others by their appearance.
traits.name: ascetic

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of his own gender.
traits.name: gay

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to both men and women.
traits.name: bisexual

traits.description: Timmy has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.
traits.name: asexual

traits.description: Timmy's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and he tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike him.
traits.name: annoyingvoice

traits.description: Timmy breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
traits.name: creepybreathing

traits.description: Timmy loves fire. he will never extinguish fires. To relieve stress, he will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. This happens more often if his mood is low. Furthermore unlike others he is able to gain pyromania focus inspirations.
traits.name: pyromaniac

traits.description: Timmy is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize him.
traits.name: wimp

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: nimble

traits.description: Timmy has a knack for learning. he picks things up much faster than others.
traits.name: fastlearner

traits.description: Timmy is slow on the uptake. he learns much slower than others.
traits.name: slowlearner

traits.description: Timmy has no need to experience the outdoors or light. he will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever and is not bothered by darkness. However, Timmy will be unhappy while outdoors.
traits.name: undergrounder

traits.description: Timmy feels limited in his feeble human body. he often dreams of being enhanced with artificial body parts or xenogenetics.
traits.name: bodymodder

traits.description: Timmy believes the human body is limited for a reason. To him, artificial body parts and xenogenes are unethical and disgusting.
traits.name: bodypurist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts men.
traits.name: misandrist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts women.
traits.name: misogynist

traits.description: Timmy has a fantastic memory for detail. he will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.
traits.name: greatmemory

traits.description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. he takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. he is extremely hard to kill.
traits.name: tough

traits.description: Timmy feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. he will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to gain either a creativity or artistry inspiration after a mental break. Furthermore unlike others he also can gain artistry inspirations when inspired by high mood.
traits.name: torturedartist

traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around food. he gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.
traits.name: gourmand

traits.description: Timmy doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether he's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, he will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
traits.name: quicksleeper

traits.description: Timmy is always falling behind the group whenever he goes anywhere.
traits.name: slowpoke

traits.description: Timmy likes to be where he's going. he walks quicker than most people.
traits.name: fastwalker

traits.description: Timmy always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
traits.name: jogger

traits.description: Timmy is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalfascination

traits.description: Timmy has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalinterest

traits.description: Timmy abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. he strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.
stats: Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.

traits.name: teetotaler

traits.description: Timmy is just naturally upbeat about his situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
traits.name: sanguine

traits.description: Timmy is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get him down.
traits.name: optimist

traits.description: Timmy tends to look on the bad side of life.
traits.name: pessimist

traits.description: Timmy is perenially unhappy. he has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.
traits.name: depressive

traits.description: Timmy's will is an iron shield. he keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
traits.name: iron-willed

traits.description: Timmy is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
traits.name: steadfast

traits.description: Timmy tends to crack under pressure.
traits.name: nervous

traits.description: Timmy is on a hair-trigger all the time. he is the first to break in any tough situation.
traits.name: volatile

traits.description: Timmy likes to have things squared away. he will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can get the better of him.
traits.name: neurotic

traits.description: Timmy feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. he will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can easily get the better of him.
traits.name: veryneurotic

traits.description: Timmy has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
traits.name: industrious

traits.description: Timmy is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
traits.name: hardworker

traits.description: Timmy is a little bit lazy.
traits.name: lazy

traits.description: Timmy loves idleness and hates anything productive. he moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
traits.name: slothful

traits.description: Timmy's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. he is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallyhypersensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallysensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is psychically out of tune with others. he isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydull

traits.description: Timmy's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. he just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydeaf

traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. he shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
traits.name: carefulshooter

traits.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! Timmy just likes pulling the trigger. he shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
traits.name: trigger-happy

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to him before he even opens his mouth.
traits.name: beautiful

traits.description: Timmy has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like him.
traits.name: pretty

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.
traits.name: ugly

traits.description: Timmy is staggeringly ugly. his face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at him while conversing.
traits.name: staggeringlyugly

traits.description: Timmy has a naturally powerful immune system. he will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
traits.name: super-immune

traits.description: Timmy has an awful immune system. he gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
traits.name: sickly

traits.description:
Timmy has fragile skin and bones. he takes more damage than other people from the same blows.
(Biotech)
traits.name: delicate

traits.description:
The fewer people in Timmy's faction, the happier he is. Being alone is best of all.
(Biotech)
traits.name: recluse

traits.description:
Timmy has outstanding memory, both in terms of retaining information but also muscle memory. his skills will never decay.
(Anomaly)
traits.name: perfectmemory

traits.description:
Timmy has deep knowledge of the twisted patterns of dark psychic energy. he can study unnatural entities faster than others. he will also periodically teach this inhuman knowledge to others when he gets the chance.
(Anomaly)
traits.name: occultist

traits.description:
Timmy has the ability to make everyone feel better and inspire them to be the best version of themselves.
(Anomaly)
traits.name: joyous

traits.description:
Timmy doesn't have basic needs like eating, sleeping, or comfort. his body is driven by some unknown mechanism, which has turned his eyes completely white.
(Anomaly)
traits.name: bodymastery

traits.description:
Timmy is a peculiar person who seems fixated on horrendous ideas. Talking to him is often upsetting.
(Anomaly)
traits.name: disturbing

traits.description:
Timmy is strangely intrigued by unnatural entities and is easily enthralled by them.
(Anomaly)
traits.name: voidfascination

traits.description:
Timmy has a gentle and cool-headed nature. he is less likely to insult others or starts fights, and will sometimes cheer up others.
(Big and Small - Framework)
traits.name: gentle

traits.description:
Timmy is able to use oversized weapons.
(Big and Small - Framework)
traits.name: giant

traits.description:
Timmy enjoys the solitude and tranquility inherent to long fishing sessions. he will prefer fishing above other activities.
(Vanilla Fishing Expanded)
traits.name: fisherman

traits.description:
Psychic enthrallment caused by incredibly strong mental influence. Thralls don't need to sleep or have recreation, but are unable to do skilled work and engage in social interactions.
(Vanilla Psycasts Expanded)
traits.name: thrall

traits.description:
Timmy is entombed in a warcasket. No amount of pain will have an effect on them, and they can never go into a pain shock or drop unconscious due to pain. Because of how bulky the armor is and how much energy it takes to use it, Timmy is not capable of doing any work.
(Vanilla Factions Expanded - Pirates)
traits.name: warcasket

traits.description:
Timmy was entombed in a warcasket, and then brutally pulled out of one. The neural and nerve damage from being unplugged is so severe that Timmy is in constant, agonizing pain and can barely assemble his thoughts. Only installing Timmy back in a warcasket can cure the symptoms.
(Vanilla Factions Expanded - Pirates)
traits.name: shellcasket

traits.description:
Either the body or mind of Timmy is one of insight and experience. While some find them old fashioned, others will respect their guidance.
(Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures)

data.mod: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures

traits.name: elder

traits.description:
A strict principle of nonviolence which applies to all living things.
(Alpha Memes)
traits.name: vowofnonviolence

traits.description:
Timmy always shies away from danger. he is usually the first to flee from battle.
(Combat Extended)
traits.name: cowardly

traits.description:
Few things scare Timmy. In battle he stands unfazed where others panic and flee.
(Combat Extended)
traits.name: brave

traits.description:
Timmy laughs in the face of danger. Some ascribe it to bravery, others to stupidity. Either way, Timmy seems to lack any sense of self-preservation and will never flee from a threatening situation.
(Combat Extended)
traits.name: fearless

traits.description:
Timmy is a successful product of an ancient experimental project, he almost entirely specialized for combat. he is extremely hard to defeat.
(Ancient urban ruins)
traits.name: successfulproducts

traits.description:
Timmy is a fashion guy who is skilled at shooting in a slide shovel, he can use gun to blast everything he sees.
(Ancient urban ruins)
traits.name: fashionguy

traits.description:
Timmy was implanted with an excessive amount of parasites, which completely destroyed his sanity but greatly increased his strength.
(Ancient urban ruins)
traits.name: parasiticfailedproduct

traits.description:
Timmy has been blessed by the Mechanicus to be overall better than regular humans at all tasked related to research, craft and mining. he is blessed for a harsh working environment.
(Astra Militarum Imperial Guard Core Mod v2.5)

data.mod: Astra Militarum Imperial Guard Core Mod v2.5

traits.name: imperial-mechanicus

traits.description:
Timmy has been blessed by the Emperor to be overall better than regular humans at all tasked related to combat to better serve the Emperor against Chaos. he is blessed with general combat excellence.
(Astra Militarum Imperial Guard Core Mod v2.5)

data.mod: Astra Militarum Imperial Guard Core Mod v2.5

traits.name: imperial-astramilitarum

traits.description:
Timmy has been trained by the Officio Assassinorum to be a surgical tool to serve the Emperor against Chaos. he is blessed for combat excellence at range.
(Astra Militarum Imperial Guard Core Mod v2.5)

data.mod: Astra Militarum Imperial Guard Core Mod v2.5

traits.name: imperial-assassinorum

traits.description:
Timmy has been trained by the Inquisition as the secret police of the Imperium responsible for guarding the souls of humanity. he is blessed by the Inquisition with a many varied skills.
(Astra Militarum Imperial Guard Core Mod v2.5)

data.mod: Astra Militarum Imperial Guard Core Mod v2.5

traits.name: imperial-inquisition

traits.description:
Timmy has been training in the arts of all medicine to help their fellow imperial citizens. he is blessed with medical excellence.
(Astra Militarum Imperial Guard Core Mod v2.5)

data.mod: Astra Militarum Imperial Guard Core Mod v2.5

traits.name: imperial-medic

traits.description:
Timmy has been blessed by the Emperor be the pinnacle of Human Warfare as one of his Chosen Astarte in the fight against Chaos. he is blessed with the Astarte Trait.
(Astra Militarum Imperial Guard Core Mod v2.5)

data.mod: Astra Militarum Imperial Guard Core Mod v2.5

traits.name: imperial-astarte

traits.description:
Timmy hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.
(Humanoid Alien Races)
traits.name: xenophobe

traits.description:
Timmy thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.
(Humanoid Alien Races)
traits.name: xenophile

traits.description:
Timmy is truly gigantic by the standards of their kind. They are sturdier than usual, but being significantly larger than normal for their kind does slow them down somewhat and make them more prone to early heart attacks and other health-issues.
(Big and Small - Genes & More)
traits.name: gigantism

traits.description:
Timmy is both taller and bulkier than usual for their kind. This makes them sturdier but slightly slower.
(Big and Small - Genes & More)
traits.name: large

traits.description:
Timmy is a bit smaller than usual for their kind.
(Big and Small - Genes & More)
traits.name: small

traits.description:
Timmy is much smaller than usual for their kind.
(Big and Small - Genes & More)
traits.name: dwarfism

traits.description:
Timmy learns faster in skills they lack passion in.

(This increase to no-passion learning will not show in the skill UI)
(Big and Small - Genes & More)
traits.name: diligentstudent

traits.description:
Timmy learns much faster in skills they lack passion in.

(This increase to no-passion learning will not show in the skill UI)
(Big and Small - Genes & More)
traits.name: verydiligentstudent

traits.description:
There is something about Timmy that makes predators not consider them prey
(Big and Small - Genes & More)
traits.name: animalfriend

traits.description:
Timmy loves alcohol. he will never stop being addicted to it.
(Big and Small - Genes & More)
traits.name: alcohollover

traits.description:
Timmy doesn't react to insults or to either part failing a flirt attempt.
(Big and Small - Genes & More)
traits.name: uninsultable

traits.description:
Timmy isn't bothered by rough appearances, a bit of rough living. Timmy also doesn't care as much for royal titles.
(Big and Small - Genes & More)
traits.name: unpretentious

traits.description:
Timmy dislikes children.
(Children, school and learning)
traits.name: dislikeschildren

traits.description:
Timmy is the child of a werewolf and will first transfrom when coming of age.
(Children, school and learning)
traits.name: werewolf-child

traits.description:
Timmy has been born in the colony.
(Children, school and learning)
traits.name: naturalborncolony-child

traits.description:
Timmy is too young to work.
(Children, school and learning)
traits.name: tooyoungtowork

traits.description:
Timmy is obsessed with germs and will wash much more frequently than normal.
(Dubs Bad Hygiene)
traits.name: germaphobe

traits.description:
Timmy is very hygienic and will wash more frequently.
(Dubs Bad Hygiene)
traits.name: hygienic

traits.description:
Timmy is very unhygienic and will wash less frequently.
(Dubs Bad Hygiene)
traits.name: unhygienic

traits.description:
Timmy has very low standards of cleanliness and will only wash when they absolutely have to.
(Dubs Bad Hygiene)
traits.name: slob

traits.description:
Timmy is careful with his words, and will often choose to keep all kinds of news close to his heart.
(Desynchronized: Tales and News (Continued))
traits.name: secretkeeper

traits.description:
Timmy enjoys sharing his opinions on many topics with his friends, and will often tell others what he knows.
(Desynchronized: Tales and News (Continued))
traits.name: gossiper

traits.description:
Timmy detests manual labor, feeling that tasks such as cleaning and hauling are beneath him. he will perform such tasks more slowly than others would, and will also carry less per load when required to haul.
(More Than Capable (1.5))
traits.name: hatesdumblabor

traits.description:
Timmy is an ally who will one day join your faction.
(Reunion)
traits.name: ally

traits.description:
Timmy's mind is dominated by the psychic patterns of the void. They are completely disconnected from human concerns of family, friendship, and love. Their experience of reality is distant and muted, guided by the psychic rhythm of a dark hyperintelligence.
(Vanilla Anomaly Expanded - Insanity)
traits.name: inhumanized

traits.description:
Timmy has seen the depths of the void and drank from its essence. It lives inside them still, guiding their actions and twisting their flesh. It has turned their hair brittle and white. They no longer need sleep or comfort. The void provides for them.
(Vanilla Anomaly Expanded - Insanity)
traits.name: voidtouched

traits.description:
Timmy is terrified of germs and contamination, leading to excessively slow and meticulous cleaning, but due to the careful nature will never contract flu, malaria, or plague.
(Vanilla Anomaly Expanded - Insanity)
traits.name: germaphobe

traits.description:
Timmy is panicly afraid of commitment. he will actively refuse any attachment to others, and will never form any new relationships.
(Vanilla Anomaly Expanded - Insanity)
traits.name: noncommittal

traits.description:
Timmy's emotional foundation is fragile, making him significantly more prone to crumbling under stress. he struggle to handle pressure, which often leads to breakdowns in challenging situations.
(Vanilla Anomaly Expanded - Insanity)
traits.name: impulsive

traits.description:
Timmy hyperfocuses on certain things when he feel like it, but most of the time he will struggle to concentrate on his task, severely affecting his work speed.
(Vanilla Anomaly Expanded - Insanity)
traits.name: distractable

traits.description:
Timmy suffers from severe mood swings that can last anything between a day and a quadrum. One day he might be extremely happy, whilst the next day - extremely sad.
(Vanilla Anomaly Expanded - Insanity)
traits.name: moodswings

traits.description:
Timmy is always ready with a flirtatious comment or a playful compliment, lifting the spirits of those around him. he has a knack for making others feel special and desired, however this may sometimes lead to complicated situations when his playful intentions are misinterpreted.
(Vanilla Races Expanded - Highmate)
traits.name: flirty

traits.description:
Timmy is exceptionally empathetic and sensitive to the suffering of others. Whenever he witnesses pain or hardship, it deeply affects him, resulting in memories of these events haunting Timmy for a much longer time.
(Vanilla Races Expanded - Highmate)
traits.name: distressed

traits.description:
Timmy tends to occasionally allow their mind to drift, even in the middle of working.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: absent-minded

traits.description:
Timmy has a loose screw or two, a small trade off for being naturally scientifically inclined.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: eccentric

traits.description:
Timmy strives for perfection in his work. They will naturally produce better quality products at the expense of time. However, making a low quality product will upset them. Additionally, they may very rarely quit a project mid attempt if they don't like the direction its going in.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description:
While fully capable of warfare in theory, Timmy's fight or flight instincts heavily lean towards flight, and he will try to hide or run as a first priority.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: coward

traits.description:
Timmy has a higher mental and physical fortitude compared to most and can more readily adapt to harsh environments in the rimworlds.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: brave

traits.description:
Minor bruises and scrapes plague Timmy all too often, mostly due to uncoordinated tripping or falling.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: clumsy

traits.description:
Timmy loves the brightness and heat of a dry summer day. They don't mind working up a sweat or sleeping in the warmth either.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: heatinclined

traits.description:
Timmy loves the overcast and cold of a brisk winter night. They don't mind getting chilly or sleeping in the cold either.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: coldinclined

traits.description:
A bomb could go off next to Timmy while they sleep and they'd continue to do so. They can't be bothered to defend the colony mid catnap, either.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: heavysleeper

traits.description:
Timmy is naturally hygenic and organized. They will not track in dirt or throw trash anywhere, and feel happy while cleaning.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: neat

traits.description:
Timmy is sloppy naturally and leaves trash and dirt everywhere it seems. At least they're not much bothered by messes.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: slob

traits.description:
Timmy has problems taking breaks or resting mid job. he will continue to work even sacrificing their health or sleep.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: workaholic

traits.description:
Timmy has never felt nausea in his life. Throwing up or food poisoning is foreign to him.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: ironstomach

traits.description:
Timmy can't stand mistreatment of animals. he will feel happier being nuzzled or being a master to a bonded animal, but will be more deeply crushed when not master of a bonded animal or seeing one die. They also refuse to butcher.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: animallover

traits.description:
Timmy believes deeply in human superiority. Killing animals will please them and the colony losing an animal is a cherry on top according to them.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: animalhater

traits.description:
Whether because they're a bit chunky or because they shift their weight oddly, Timmy has broken a few chairs in their time and is likely to break more.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: big-boned

traits.description:
Timmy only plays by their own rules, and will roll their eyes and take it easy while doing any task they've been forced to do.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: rebel

traits.description:
Timmy needs clear instructions on how, and when to do certain things and will only work at a normal speed when being forced to do something.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: submissive

traits.description:
Timmy is fueled by spite. They can't stand walking on the same soil as their rivals and will be elated by news of their life ending.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: vengeful

traits.description:
Whether by past trauma or fear of change, Timmy rejects modernity. They may randomly punch or attack mechanical devices and refuse to learn or research anything about them. They also love killing mechanoids.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: technophobe

traits.description:
Timmy always recalls the good times and lives to party, any party attended will be remembered for many times longer than most.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: fun-loving

traits.description:
Timmy has hindered mental capacities. While slow to learn and hard to speak with, they tend to be much happier naturally.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: dunce

traits.description:
Timmy learned a specific move in melee combat which allows them to disarm opponents and will use it frequently.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: martialartist

traits.description:
Timmy believes they belong in high society, and loves nothing more than critiquing art and brushing elbows with royalty.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: snob

traits.description:
Sour stomach plagues Timmy any time they're around too much blood or rotting corpses. Vomiting is just part of life for him.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: squeamish

traits.description:
Timmy feels naturally anxious, but especially from social situations. They will not attend any gatherings and may occasionally need alone time in their room to breathe.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: anxious

traits.description:
No amount of lovin' is enough lovin' for Timmy. he will tend to jump from partner to partner and tumble between the sheets with them frequently.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: insatiable

traits.description:
Timmy refuses to give their body to anybody but their spouse and would never fathom initiating a divorce. They also hate being nude much more than other pawns.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: prude

traits.description:
An armchair and flatscreen is all Timmy needs to be happy. Even reruns or ancient commercials are entertaining to them, they will never grow bored of television and tend to watch it more, as well as feel pleased after doing so.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: couchpotato

traits.description:
Timmy is mad for all things feline. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with cats, however they're not a fan of dogs.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: catperson

traits.description:
Timmy is mad for all things canine. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with dogs, however they're not a fan of cats.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: dogperson

traits.description:
Timmy is a natural scientist. They research much faster and recall things better. However, they'll be upset without a laboratory dedicated to their work and tend to stress out more frequently.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: prodigy

traits.description:
Timmy believes animals are integral to the way society and life functions from furry friends to sources of food. They love having as many as possible and are particularly good at taming and training them.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: menagerist

traits.description:
The sea calls to Timmy. he feels happier just being near the ocean or a deep river.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: oceanlover

traits.description:
The mountains call to Timmy. he feels happier just being near a large mountain.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: mountainlover

traits.description:
Timmy has a twisted secret. he treats organ harvesting like a sick experiment, and does not even blink at the idea. While harvesting one will make them happy, going too long without giving in to their compulsion will upset them.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: madsurgeon

traits.description:
Timmy is supposedly a hand-to-hand combat specialist, but only when inebriated. They claim to become more talented the more drunk they are.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: drunkenmaster

traits.description:
Timmy is compulsive to steal and take things that don't belong to them, even if it means angering the other party.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: kleptomaniac

traits.description:
Smokeleaf culture is just part of life for Timmy. he absolutely adores smokeleaf and would rather die before giving it up.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: stoner

traits.description:
Alcohol culture is just part of life for Timmy. he absolutely adores booze and would rather die before giving it up.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: lush

traits.description:
Timmy loves to travel and does so swiftly, but can grow upset if they haven't done so in a while. They are also quite adept at foraging while traveling.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: wanderlust

traits.description:
Timmy is never really asleep or awake. he is almost zombie like, lurching along and working very slowly, and will only sleep once every three days or so.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: insomniac

traits.description:
Timmy has grown tired of the world and needs to be constantly distracted to stop dark thoughts. his bleak personality is a big downer and therefore it is very hard to become friends with them.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: worldweary

traits.description:
Timmy is hardened through what can only be presumed as old emotional trauma. They feel absolutely nothing from lost animals, colonists, family, prisoners or dead bodies.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: desensitized

traits.description:
Only the finest of culinary creations may grace the lips of Timmy. They feel neutral towards mundane meals, but will laud and savour lavish meals down to the last bite.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: refinedpalate

traits.description:
Whether through studying ancient manuscripts or years of scholastic pursuit Timmy is surprisingly well read on a variety of topics, particularly science and medical practice.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: academian

traits.description:
Timmy strongly believes infrastucture rules all and is a natural born stoneworker.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: groundbreaker

traits.description:
In the eyes of Timmy food is art, their culinary creations are incredibly beautiful, amazing to taste, and almost always safe to eat.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: gastronomist

traits.description:
Flora and fauna are both vital to Timmy. They use all parts of plants and animals and strongly appreciate mother Gaia's blessings.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: ecologist

traits.description:
Timmy has an eye for silver and a tongue made from it. They believe their products are the best products and he will likely convince you if given the chance.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: tycoon

traits.description:
Timmy is strangely hypercoagulating and will bleed much more slowly than most.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: thickskinned

traits.description:
Timmy is strangely hemophilic and tends to bleed much more profusely than others.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: thinskinned

traits.description:
Timmy has trouble expressing themselves until its all too much to bear, whereafter they will have an utter meltdown.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
traits.name: schizoid

traits.description:
Timmy genes have been perfected, and is now a fully fledged space marine.
(Warhammer 40.000 - Genes)
traits.name: spacemarine

traits.description:
Timmy genes have been perfected, and is now a fully fledged primaris marine.
(Warhammer 40.000 - Genes)
traits.name: primarismarine

traits.description:
Timmy genes have been perfected, and is now a fully fledged custodes.
(Warhammer 40.000 - Genes)
traits.name: custodes

traits.description:
Timmy genes have been perfected, and is now a fully fledged primarch.
(Warhammer 40.000 - Genes)
traits.name: primarch

traits.description:
Timmy has a stunted intellect, they operate at a level similar to children and as such cannot perform complex task.
(Warhammer 40.000 - Abhumans)
traits.name: stuntedintellect

traits.description:
Timmy is romantically attracted to people of the opposite gender.
((RF) Rational Romance (Continued))
traits.name: straight

traits.description:
Timmy will never cheat on a partner, no matter how bad the relationship gets.
((RF) Rational Romance (Continued))
traits.name: faithful

traits.description:
Timmy just cannot be trusted to stay faithful to a partner.
((RF) Rational Romance (Continued))
traits.name: philanderer

traits.description:
Timmy prefers romantic relationships involving multiple partners to monogamous relationships. he doesn't mind if his partners romance other people, but will be less happy in a restraining, monogamous relationship.
((RF) Rational Romance (Continued))
traits.name: polyamorous

traits.description:
Timmy just can't keep a secret.
((RF) Rumor Has It.... (Continued))
traits.name: gossip

traits.description:
Timmy is someone you can trust with your innermost thoughts. If you ask him to keep something to himself, he will.
((RF) Rumor Has It.... (Continued))
traits.name: trustworthy

traits.description:
Timmy is socially manipulative. he doesn't always talk ill of people, but if he doesn't like someone, he will try to turn the rest of the colony against them.
((RF) Rumor Has It.... (Continued))
traits.name: manipulative

traits.description:
Timmy just can't stand other people fighting. he will always try to persuade others to put aside their differences..
((RF) Rumor Has It.... (Continued))
traits.name: peacemaker

traits.description:
Timmy doesn't have a particular problem keeping other people's secrets, but can't help over sharing his own.
((RF) Rumor Has It.... (Continued))
traits.name: gushing

traits.description:
Timmy has a difficult relationship with the truth. This causes him to have difficult relationships with other colonists, as well. 
((RF) Rumor Has It.... (Continued))
traits.name: compulsiveliar

traits.description:
Timmy lives for the thrill of the action. he gets a rush from the adrenaline that flows throughout his veins.
((XND) Adrenaline! (Continued))
traits.name: adrenalinejunkie

traits.description:
Timmy tends to keep calm in heated situations and generally doesn't get an adrenaline rush from them.
((XND) Adrenaline! (Continued))
traits.name: cool-headed

races.description: A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
races.name: human

races.description:
A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
(Anomaly)
races.name: human

races.description:
A baseline Chaos Space Marine.
(Astra Militarum Imperial Guard Factions Mod v2.5)
races.name: Chaos Space Marine

races.description:
This is a creature largely composed of highly ruggedized machinery.
(Big and Small - Framework)
races.name: mech
